item.title: True Clouds | 4K Streaming of any media
item.description:
True Clouds | 4K Streaming of any media

True Clouds developed disruptive technologies that will impact multiple industries in a way that will fundamentally change the way people create, consume, and distribute information. Broadcasting, live streaming and surveillance are the first areas True Clouds will improve. Blazing speeds are now available everywhere including wired and wireless solutions.

item.title: No title
item.description: Industries True Clouds developed disruptive technologies that will impact multiple industries in a way that will fundamentally change the way people create, consume, and distribute information. Broadcasting, live streaming and surveillance are the first areas True Clouds will improve. Blazing speeds are now available everywhere including wired and wireless solutions. With Apple, Microsoft and Adobe as main players in this market, True Clouds lossless technology will have a groundbreaking effect on the quality available to consumers. Traditional and Digital Agencies Developpers working on Apps, games, and communications technologies Broadcast agencies Studios

item.title: Deliver 4K content to any deviceThe smart cloud based platform for secure mediaWe provide tools that allow content producers, broadcasters, and telecommunication companies to deliver the highest quality of interactive video in the market today.
